name: inmobi_app_cron/

recipes.inmobi_app_cron::default: Installs crons only if the tage provided is missing

inmobi_app_cron/app_name.display_name: Mention the identifier for the application name that this cron package is being used for

inmobi_app_cron/debians.display_name: Give space separated list of pkg1=version1,pkg2=version2,... entries
inmobi_app_cron/debians.description: If version number is omitted packagename with latest version will be installed

description: Install app_package for cron if tag not present inmobi_app_cron
